item.title: Hello World in Redis
item.description: This writing is actually a draft note made for myself, so that I myself don’t forget what I had learned. But I think this note will be helpful for those who want to learn Redis. 1. Hello World in Redis 1.1. PING Returns PONG if no argument is provided, otherwise return a copy of the argument as a bulk. This command is often used to test if a connection is still alive, or to measure latency.

item.title: Redis Introduction and Installation
item.description: This writing is actually a draft note made for myself, so that I myself don’t forget what I had learned. But I think this note will be helpful for those who want to learn Redis. 1. Introduction to Redis Redis is an acronym for Remote dictionary server. It’s an open source, in-memory and persistent key-value database / store which stores data as key-value pairs and also doubles up as a message broker.
